location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: This bundle consists of summaries of three secret dispatches from HM Consul at Tehran, Richard W Stevens (17 and 22 September 1856, Numbers 58 and 60-61). They consist of news from Persia covering: a report of conflict between the Shah [Nasser Al-Din Shah Qajar] and the Sedr Azeem [Mirza Aqa Khan-e Nouri, Sadr-i-A'zam or Grand Vizier], the confiscation of land from Prince Allah Koolee Meerza for offering to drive the Persians from Herat, and contradictory reports received regarding the situation at Herat.

name.namePart: Prime Minister to the Shah of Persia, Qajar dynasty
